name: adidas Forum Buckle Low Bad Bunny Last Forum

details.description:
The adidas Forum Buckle Low White is a collaborative sneaker between the German lifestyle brand and artist Bad Bunny.

The shoe has an off-white leather upper with matching suede overlays, and the signature 3-Stripes are made of grey suede. An adjustable ankle strap and toggle lacing that wraps around the collar is added to the laces for a secure fit. The "third eye" logo of Bad Bunny is displayed on two sets of overlapping tongues. The shoe has clear rubber sidewalls on a rubber cup sole.

The adidas Forum Buckle Low White debuted on the market on December 10th, 2022, retailing at $160.

name: adidas Forum Low CL Cream White Dark Blue (GS)
adidas Forum Low White Black

details.description:
The adidas Forum Low White Black is a basketball-inspired sneaker.

The Forum Low White Black features a strap system on the side panels and a padded tongue and collar, as well as a cushioned insole. The sole of these shoes are made from durable rubber, providing excellent traction on different surfaces. The shoe features a combination of white and black leather on the upper, with a white midsole and a black rubber outsole. The adidas logo is displayed on the side and on the strap that goes across the tongue.

We think that the notable feature of the adidas Forum Low White Black sneakers is their classic basketball-inspired design. This iconic sneaker features a distinctive ankle strap for added support, with details such as a low-cut silhouette and perforated toe box for breathability. The adidas Forum Low White Black was released on May 5, 2021 at a retail price of $110.

name: adidas Forum Low CL Cream White Dark Blue

details.description:
The adidas Forum Low CL Cream White Dark Blue is a stylish and versatile sneaker that combines classic design with modern comfort. Featuring a sleek low-top silhouette, this iteration of the iconic Forum model showcases a premium cream white leather upper accented with dark blue details. The contrasting color scheme creates a visually appealing look that's easy to pair with various outfits.

Built for both style and functionality, the Forum Low CL boasts adidas' renowned cushioning technology for all-day comfort. The durable rubber outsole provides excellent traction, while the padded collar and tongue offer enhanced support. With its timeless design and quality craftsmanship, this sneaker is perfect for casual wear or as a statement piece in your footwear collection.

Us at StockX believe this product is great for those seeking a versatile sneaker that effortlessly blends retro charm with contemporary style. The Forum Low CL's comfortable fit and eye-catching colorway make it an excellent choice for everyday wear or as a standout addition to any sneaker enthusiast's collection.

name: adidas Forum 84 Low Bape 30th Anniversary Green Camo

details.description:
The adidas Forum 84 Low Bape 30th Anniversary Green Camo presents an intriguing collaboration between the tried and true basketball silhouette and the Japanese streetwear and lifestyle fashion brand that opened its first store in 1993.

The Bape 30th Anniversary Edition of the adidas Forum 84 in a Green Camo colorway sports a leather upper with a grainy texture and the classic Bape camo pattern. True to the Forum silhouette, a hook and loop strap secures the top of the laces and the toe box is perforated for enhanced ventilation. The EVA midsole along with the chunky rubber outsole provide cushioning, support, and bounce for the basketball court or the city streets.

What we love most about this sneaker are all the hits of dual branding, including the Bathing Ape icon nestled in the lateral side camo on the quarter panel, just behind the cut-out window featuring the iconic adidas three stripes. The adidas Forum 84 Low Bape 30th Anniversary Green Camo was released on May 20, 2023 for a retail price of $180.

name: adidas Forum Low Triple White

details.description: The adidas Forum Low Triple White is a classic sneaker that has been updated with a fresh, monochromatic colorway. The shoe features a leather upper with perforated details for breathability, as well as a padded collar and tongue for added comfort. The iconic adidas stripes are present on the sides, while the brand's logo is embossed on the heel. The shoe sits atop a durable rubber outsole for traction and durability. The release date for this shoe is March 1st, 2021, and it retails for $90. The Triple White colorway is perfect for those who want a clean and versatile sneaker that can be dressed up or down. Overall, the adidas Forum Low Triple White is a timeless sneaker that is sure to be a staple in any sneakerhead's collection.

name: adidas Forum Low The Simpsons Living Room

details.description:
The adidas Forum Low The Simpsons Living Room is another collaboration between the iconic German sneaker company and the world-famous animated series. This shoe takes a classic silhouette originally designed in 1984 and dresses it in the colors and details from the living room of The Simpsons.

The base of The Simpsons Living Room X adidas Forum Low is smooth pink leather, overlaid with aqua green suede at the toe and heel, with hairy darker pink suede for the characteristic three stripes on the side panel. Mustard brown corduroy overlays mimic the couch from The Simpsons living room, while the chenille toebox recalls the carpet. adidas trefoil branding lands on the side panel and dual branding graces the insole. The white EVA foam midsole sits atop a white, yellow, and gum rubber outsole with trefoils worked into the traction pattern.

What we love most about this shoe are the embroidered details. The family dog, Santa's Little Helper, and cat, Snowball II, adorn the heels, while the picture on the living room wall is featured on the tongue. The adidas Forum Low The Simpsons Living Room debuted on November 11, 2023, for $120.

name: adidas Forum Low Bad Bunny Pink Easter Egg

details.description:
The adidas Forum Low Bad Bunny Pink is a collaborative sneaker between adidas and the Latin musician.​
​​
​This Low Forum shoe in pink by adidas boasts a combination of leather and suede materials.The shoe also features details in the form of an adjustable toggle that runs around the heel and a buckle across the tongue. In the center there is Bad Bunny´s signature "El Ojo" and the phrase "Yo Visto asi" on the inside of the strap. The brand´s 3-Stripes complete the design.​
​​
​The adidas Forum Low Bad Bunny Pink was launched on April 4th, 2021, at a retail price of $140.

name: adidas Forum 84 Low Ivory Preloved Green
adidas Forum Mod Low Ivory Off White Collegiate Green
adidas Forum Buckle Low Bad Bunny Blue Tint

details.description:
The adidas Forum Buckle Low Bad Bunny Blue Tint joins the Low Bad Bunny Forum launched by adidas and the Puerto Rican rapper, Bad Bunny.

These adidas blue tint shoes have leather and suede uppers. They feature a black heavy-duty metal buckle on each side secured onto the nylon straps of the shoes. The shoes have a shoe-heel drawstring chord, detachable double-stacked tongue with Bad Bunny’s branding, a protruding foam piece on the collars, icy blue rubber outsoles, partially translucent midsoles, and soft yellow and pink laces completing the design.  

The adidas Forum Buckle Low Bad Bunny Blue Tint was released in August 2022 with a retail price of $160.

name: adidas Forum Low White Royal Blue

details.description:
Since its first release, the adidas Forum Low White Royal Blue remains one of the highest selling variants in the adidas Forum series.

The adidas Forum Low White Royal Blue design has a white leather base and toe box with three blue stripes on each of its sides to enhance the silhouette’s retro scheme. The retro design becomes complete with the entire ensemble resting on the rubber sole engraved the adidas logo.

The adidas Forum Low White Royal Blue was first released on March 3, 2021 as the flagship basketball silhouette for adidas. The price at the time of its debut was $100.

name: adidas Forum Low The Grinch

details.description:
The adidas Forum Low The Grinch was made available as part of a special edition that came in different color codes, including green, black, and white.

Polyester is the main material used in the manufacture of this adidas Forum model. The upper of the shoe includes a long hair suede executed in the "Grinch" green colorway. The jewels on the tongue, the long green tongue, and the green rubber outsole complete the design. The 3-Stripes as well as Trefoil are visible on its sides.  

The adidas Forum Low The Grinch was first released on December 1st, 2022, with a retail price of $120.

name: adidas Forum 84 Low Bape 30th Anniversary Blue Camo

details.description:
The adidas Forum 84 Low BAPE 30th Anniversary Blue Camo is a celebration of sorts. It helps mark both BAPE’s 30th anniversary and the 20th anniversary of the first collaboration between adidas and BAPE.

To celebrate the occasion, adidas lent BAPE its iconic Forum 84 Low sneaker and allowed the brand to cover its leather upper with BAPE’s instantly recognizable camo. The two brands also teamed up to add co-branding to the sneaker, including each of their logos and matching gold jewels on the laces. It helps illustrate the connection adidas and BAPE have shared over time.

In our expert opinion, it’s the seamless design of this sneaker that makes it work so well. adidas and BAPE managed to weave elements of their individual brands together without it feeling forced in the slightest. The adidas Forum 84 Low BAPE 30th Anniversary Blue Camo was released on 20th May 20 2023 for $180.

name: adidas Forum 84 Low Off White Shadow Navy

details.description:
The adidas Forum 84 Low Off White Shadow Navy is a stylish and versatile sneaker that combines classic design with modern comfort. This iteration of the iconic Forum model features a sleek low-top silhouette, crafted with a premium off-white leather upper accented by shadow navy details. The shoe's timeless appeal is enhanced by the distinctive adidas three-stripe branding on the side panels and the trefoil logo on the heel tab.

Designed for both style and functionality, the Forum 84 Low boasts a comfortable padded collar and a cushioned EVA midsole for all-day support. The cream white rubber outsole provides excellent traction and durability, making these sneakers suitable for various casual occasions. With its retro-inspired look and contemporary updates, this adidas Forum 84 Low is a perfect blend of nostalgia and modern sneaker culture.

Us at StockX believe this product is great for sneaker enthusiasts looking for a versatile and comfortable shoe that can easily transition from day to night. The classic colorway and timeless silhouette make it an excellent choice for those who appreciate both style and heritage in their footwear.

name: adidas Forum Low CL Cloud White Clear Pink (Women's)
adidas Forum Wings 1.0 Low ADV Jeremy Scott Money

details.description:
Bliss and off white are the two dominant tones that define the outside appearance of the adidas Forum Wings 1.0 Low ADV Jeremy Scott Money.

The Jeremy Scott Money x adidas Forum Wings 1.0 Low ADV transforms the classic '80s basketball shoe with a textile upper adorned with a unique currency-themed pattern designed by the American designer Scott. The print replaces George Washington's image with Scott's own distinctive design. On the side of the sneaker, there is an elaborate 3D wing overlay that completes the model. The shoe offers lightweight cushioning thanks to an EVA wedge situated within a durable rubber cup sole. The lateral sidewall displays embossed adidas branding, while Jeremy Scott's signature marks the opposite side.

The adidas Forum Wings 1.0 Low ADV Jeremy Scott Money made its entry to the market for the first time on 21st October 2021 with a suggested price of $150.

name: adidas Forum Low CL Ivory Wonder Beige Sand
adidas Forum Low CL Cloud White Crew Blue
adidas Forum 84 Low ADV Core Black Gum
